title: Android Permissions
desc: Application required permissions.

title: Android Storage
desc: Use Android private/public storage

title: Android entry point
desc: Main activity of your app. Default is ok for Kivy-based app

title: Screen wake lock
desc: Indicate whether the screen should stay on. Don't forget to add the WAKE_LOCK permission if you set this to True

title: Application meta-data
desc:
Application meta-data to set.
Create each item with in key=value format

title: Extra XMLs
desc: Extra XML file to include as an intent filters in <activity> tag

title: Android API
desc: Android API Level

title: Android Minimum API
desc: Android Minimum API Level

title: Android SDK
desc: Android SDK version to use

title: Android NDK
desc: Android NDK to use

title: Android SDK Path
desc: Custom Android SDK path. If empty, it will be automatically downloaded

title: Android NDK Path
desc: Custom Android NDK path. If empty, it will be automatically downloaded

title: OUYA Console category
desc: OUYA Console category. Should be one of GAME or APP. If you leave this blank, OUYA support will not be enabled

title: OUYA Console icon
desc:
Filename of OUYA Console icon. It must be a 732x412 png image.
Example: %(source.dir)s/data/ouya_icon.png

title: External libraries
desc:
List of extra Java .jar files to add to the libs.
Example: foo.jar,bar.jar,path/to/more/*.jar

title: External Java files
desc: List of Java files to add to the android project (can be .java or a  directory containing the files)

title: Android architecture
desc: The Android arch to build for: armeabi-v7a, arm64-v8a, x86

title: Android additional libraries to copy into libs/armeabi - armeabi
desc:
Android additional libraries to copy into libs/armeabi.
Example: libs/android/*.so

title: Android additional libraries to copy into libs/armeabi - armeabi v7a
desc:
Android additional libraries to copy into libs/armeabi.
Example: libs/android-v7/*.so

title: Android additional libraries to copy into libs/armeabi - x86
desc:
Android additional libraries to copy into libs/armeabi.
Example: libs/android-x86/*.so

title: Android additional libraries to copy into libs/armeabi - mips
desc:
Android additional libraries to copy into libs/armeabi.
Example: libs/android-mips/*.so

title: Add library project
desc: Android library project to add (will be added in the project.properties automatically.)

title: python-for-android git clone path
desc: python-for-android git clone path (if empty, it will be automatically cloned from Github)

title: python-for-android whitelist
desc: python-for-android whitelist

title: python-for-android branch
desc: Set a custom python-for-android branch

title: ANT directory
desc: ANT directory (if empty, it will be automatically downloaded.)

title: Own build recipes
desc: The directory in which python-for-android should look for your own build recipes (if any)

title: python-for-android hook
desc: Filename to the hook for p4a

title: Skip SDK update
desc: Useful to avoid excess Internet downloads or save time.

title: Bootstrap
desc: Bootstrap to use for android builds (android_new only)

title: Logcat filters
desc: Android logcat filters to use

title: Copy libraries
desc: Copy library instead of making a libpymodules.so
